subject: Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: The salaries of Penn State Coach Joe Paterno and the university’s top administrators must be disclosed by the state retirement system, the state Supreme Court ruled yesterday. The 4-to-2 decision said the Commonwealth Court, which had ordered the disclosure, balanced the public’s interest in knowing about retirement system finances against the effects disclosure might have on reputations and personal security. There has been speculation for years that Paterno is among the highest-paid coaches, but the numbers have never been made public.
